long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Celebrity News Shield"

Say goodbye to the endless stream of celebrity news that clutters your feed and annoys you to no end. With our app, you can finally block out the Kardashians, the Real Housewives, and all the other celebs that make you want to scream.

Our simple yet powerful interface allows you to choose which celebrities or phrases you want to shield yourself from, and voila! No more articles about who's dating who, who wore it better, or who got a new dog. You're free to focus on the things that matter to you.

So why suffer in silence any longer? Install "Celebrity News Shield" today and take back control of your life. Who knows, you might even have time to become a celebrity yourself (or not, your call)!

Join all of the satisfied users who have already shielded themselves from the drama and the gossip. Don't let celebrity news get in the way of your happiness - shield up and live your best life!
